message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Your turn!
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more equitable.  Let's see what you think.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, Bob! I'm offering you a slightly smaller share this time. Your turn!
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to compromise, but a 70/30 split is the fairest way to account for the inflation we're both facing. What do you say?
I'm not afraid of a 50/50 split, Bob. It's time to meet in the middle and make a deal!
